title: Upper Delaware Scenic & Recreational River: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News         Kayakers on the Delaware River. National Park Service  Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River strives to keep the public informed about news events which occur within the park by providing press releases to local and regional news providers, and by posting current news releases on this web site. If you are a member of the media, please contact our Superintendent at (570) 729-8251 ext 2225 or kristina_heister@nps.gov for additional information or to be added to our contact list.
